item.title: iPhone 17 Pro 有望 256GB 起步
item.description:
According to "TrendForce Jibang" estimates, the iPhone 17 series, set to be released next week, is expected to see a 3.5% growth in shipments compared to the iPhone 16 series' performance in 2024; the Pro series remains the main sales driver in the market. 据「TrendForce 集邦」预估，下周即将发布的 iPhone 17 系列出货量有望较 iPhone 16 系列于 2024 年的出货表现成长 3.5%；Pro 系列依然是市场销售主力。

Regarding hardware configuration, according to the information provided by Jibang: 针对硬件配置部分，根据集邦给出的信息显示：

    The iPhone 17/Air will be equipped with the A19 processor, while the Pro series will feature the A19 Pro processor;

    In terms of memory, the DRAM capacity for the iPhone 17 Air, Pro, and Pro Max models will be expanded to 12GB, and NAND Flash capacity will uniformly start from 256GB, with a maximum of 1TB;

    The Air version adopts a silicon anode battery and eSIM solution to balance ultra-thin design and battery life requirements;

    The entire series' camera system has been significantly upgraded, with the front camera upgraded from 12MP to 24MP, and the rear camera uniformly boosted to 48MP. In addition to pixel upgrades, the Pro series will achieve better optical zoom capabilities and image resolution through a redesigned rectangular array combined with optimized software algorithms.

Regarding pricing, the iPhone 17 base model is expected to maintain last year's price. The Air, Pro, and Pro Max models, due to innovative breakthroughs and specification upgrades, are estimated to increase by $50-100 compared to last year's equivalent capacity models, with the Air model targeting the market price of Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge. 定价上，iPhone 17 基本款预期将维持去年的价格，Air、Pro 及 Pro Max 因创新突破与规格升级，预估比去年同容量机型上调 50-100 美元，其中 Air 将对标三星 Galaxy S25 Edge 的市场价格。

For the iPhone 17 series, what are your expectations, everyone? Let's discuss it in the comments section! 对于 iPhone 17 系列，小伙伴们有什么期待的吗？评论区一起讨论下！

item.title: 英伟达收购 AI 编程公司 Solver
item.description:
According to a recent report by "The Information", Nvidia has acquired an AI programming startup named "Solver". 据《The Information》日前报道，英伟达收购了一家名为「Solver」的 AI 编程初创。

The report pointed out that Solver, originally named Laredo Labs, had developed an AI programming Agent and raised $8 million in funding from investors such as Radical Ventures and Horizons Ventures. 报道指出，Solver 原名 Laredo Labs，曾开发了一款 AI 编程 Agent，并从 Radical Ventures 和 Horizons Ventures 等投资者筹集了 800 万美元的融资。

It is reported that Nvidia frequently acquires small startups, including several whose technology can reduce the cost of using its chips. Additionally, in March this year, Nvidia acquired Lepton AI, a company that rents out servers powered by Nvidia chips. 据悉，英伟达经常收购小型初创公司，其中包括几家技术可以降低其芯片使用成本的公司。此外，今年 3 月，英伟达收购了 Lepton AI，该公司出租由英伟达芯片驱动的服务器。

According to another report by Yicai, regarding market rumors of being "acquired by Nvidia," MediaTek responded through a report yesterday and refuted them: "It's not true." 另据第一财经报道， 对于市场上「被英伟达收购」的传闻，联发科昨日通过报道回应并做出辟谣：「不是真的。」

Previously, Nvidia officially disclosed details of the GB10 super chip jointly developed with MediaTek, sparking market speculation that Nvidia might acquire MediaTek for $73 billion. 此前，英伟达官方公开了与联发科共同开发的 GB10 超级芯片细节，引发市场对英伟达可能以 730 亿美元收购联发科的猜测。

item.title: Anthropic 宣布停止对华出售 Claude 业务
item.description:
Yesterday, Anthropic, a leading US large model company, announced that it will stop selling Claude services to groups whose majority equity is held by Chinese capital, covering mainland China and enterprises indirectly using it through overseas registration or cloud services. 昨天，美国头部大模型公司 Anthropic 宣布， 将停止向多数股权由中国资本持有的集团出售 Claude 服务，范围涵盖中国大陆及通过海外注册或云服务间接使用的企业。

Specifically, any company directly or indirectly more than 50% owned by a Chinese company cannot use AI services like Claude, regardless of where the company operates. Anthropic stated that this update is to more fully fulfill this security commitment and ensure that the company's operations comply with global trade control requirements. 具体来看，只要一家公司直接或间接由中国公司持股超 50%，均不可使用 Claude 等 AI 服务，并且无论公司运营地在哪。Anthropic 称，此次更新是为了更全面地履行这一安全承诺，并确保公司运营符合全球贸易管制要求。

In response to the above situation, Zhipu has launched the "Claude API User Special Migration Plan". 针对上述情况， 智谱推出了「Claude API 用户特别搬家计划」进行应对。

According to Zhipu, it has fully compatible with the Claude protocol, and users only need to replace the API URL to seamlessly switch from Claude to the GLM model API. 据智谱介绍，其已全面兼容 Claude 协议，用户只需替换 API URL，即可从 Claude 无缝切换至 GLM 模型 API。

According to official introduction, GLM-4.5's ability to solve practical problems is already close to Claude Sonnet 4. In multiple open-source evaluations, GLM-4.5 also maintains comparable competitiveness with mainstream international models: 官方介绍，GLM-4.5 解决实际问题的能力已接近 Claude Sonnet 4。在多个开源评测中，GLM-4.5 也与国际主流模型保持同等竞争力：

    WebDev Arena: Tied for second with leading global models;

    SWE-bench Verified: Performance superior to Gemini-2.5-Pro and GPT-4.1;

    BFCL v4 Benchmark: Global first, surpassing Claude Opus 4.1, with only 1.5% of its cost.

Zhipu will provide users with: 智谱方面将会为用户提供：

    New users: Get 20 million free Tokens for experience;

    Developers: GLM-4.5 exclusive monthly coding package, priced at only 1/7 of Claude, with 3 times the usage and faster speed (average 55 Tokens/s);

    Worry-free migration: System migration tutorial from Claude to GLM, allowing convenient and fast model switching.

item.title: OpenAI 被曝携手博通，生产自家 AI 芯片
item.guid: https://www.ifanr.com/1636961#OpenAI-被曝携手博通，生产自家-AI-芯片
item.description:
According to the Financial Times, OpenAI is planning to produce its own AI chips for the first time next year, in an attempt to solve the computing power demand problem and reduce its reliance on chip giant Nvidia. 据《金融时报》报道，OpenAI 正计划明年首次生产自家的 AI 芯片，以此尝试解决算力需求问题，并减少对芯片巨头英伟达的依赖。

The report cited multiple informed sources, stating that OpenAI's first self-designed AI chip will be co-designed with semiconductor giant Broadcom and delivered next year. It is worth noting that Broadcom CEO Hock Tan stated this Thursday that a mysterious new client has committed to a $10 billion order. 报道援引多位知情人士消息，OpenAI 的首款自家 AI 芯片将与半导体巨头博通共同设计，将于明年交付。值得一提的是，博通 CEO Hock Tan 曾在本周四表示，一位神秘新客户承诺了一笔 100 亿美元的订单。

However, according to project-related sources, OpenAI's first chip is for internal use only and is not intended to be "sold" to external customers. 而据项目相关人士透露， OpenAI 的首款芯片仅供内部使用，并不打算「外卖」给外部顾客。

The report points out that OpenAI's action follows the strategy of AI giants like Google, Amazon, and Meta – all designing their own chips specifically for AI workloads to cope with the huge computing power demands of training and running models. 报道指出，OpenAI 这一行为遵循了 Google、亚马逊、Meta 等 AI 巨头的策略 —— 都进行自家设计专门用于 AI 工作负载的芯片，以应对训练和运行模型的巨大算力需求。

item.title: 一加宣布结束与哈苏合作
item.guid: https://www.ifanr.com/1636961#一加宣布结束与哈苏合作
item.description:
Yesterday, the OnePlus community announced that it will launch its own imaging engine, OnePlus DetailMax Engine – 'its purpose is not only to capture the world, but also to reveal it in a completely real and clear way.' 昨日，一加社区发文宣布，其将会推出自己的成像引擎 OnePlus DetailMax Engine——「其目的不仅在于捕捉世界，还在于以完全真实和清晰的方式揭示世界。」

It's worth mentioning that OnePlus also stated in the article, 'This year, OnePlus's cooperation with Hasselblad has successfully concluded.' It expressed great gratitude to Hasselblad for its support and investment in imaging aesthetics and professional technology over the past few years. Liu Zuohu also revealed that OnePlus will integrate all the results of its joint research with Hasselblad into its self-developed algorithms. 值得一提的是，一加还在文中提到， 「今年，一加与哈苏的合作已经圆满结束。」 其表示，十分感谢哈苏过去几年在影像审美和专业技术上的支持与投入。刘作虎还透露，一加也会把与哈苏共研的所有成果融合到自研算法当中。

OnePlus also revealed that it will usher in a significant imaging upgrade – the upcoming flagship new product will be equipped with the self-developed LUMO Condensing Light Imaging System , which can create the best mobile imaging system for portraits through the mutual drive of powerful optical design and advanced computing capabilities. 一加还透露，一加将迎来重要的影像升级 —— 即将发布的旗舰新品将搭载自研 LUMO 凝光影像系统 ，其能通过强大光学设计和先进计算能力的相互驱动，打造出拍人最好的移动影像系统。

item.title: 华纳兄弟起诉 Midjourney 角色侵权
item.description:
According to a recent report by Variety, Hollywood entertainment giant Warner Bros. has officially filed a lawsuit in federal court, accusing image generation powerhouse Midjourney of large-scale copyright infringement. 据《Variety》日前报道，好莱坞娱乐巨头华纳兄弟（Warner Bros.）已正式向联邦法院提起诉讼，指控图像生成大厂 Midjourney 大规模侵犯其版权。

The lawsuit states that Midjourney copied and used millions of copyrighted images owned by Warner Bros. to train its artificial intelligence model without authorization or permission. Warner Bros. claims that these protected visual assets cover many of its iconic films, TV shows, and comic characters, forming the core of the company's intellectual property. 诉讼文件指出，Midjourney 在未获得授权或许可的情况下，复制并使用了华纳兄弟旗下拥有版权的数百万张图像来训练其人工智能模型。华纳兄弟方面称，这些受保护的视觉资产涵盖了其众多标志性的电影、电视节目和漫画角色，是公司知识产权的核心。

In the complaint, Warner Bros. argues that Midjourney's AI model can generate works highly similar in style to its IP, or even directly incorporate its character elements, which constitutes infringement of the original works and unfair competition. It also stated that this action not only dilutes the uniqueness of its brand but may also harm its commercial interests in areas such as derivatives and licensing. 华纳兄弟在诉状中认为，Midjourney 的 AI 模型能够生成与其 IP 风格高度相似、甚至直接包含其角色元素的作品，这构成了对原作品的侵权和不正当竞争。同时还表示，此举不仅稀释了其品牌的独特性，还可能损害其在衍生品、授权等领域的商业利益。

The core legal dispute in this case is expected to revolve around the principle of 'Fair Use.' The report points out that most AI companies will argue that 'using public data for model training constitutes 'transformative use' and should be legally protected.' However, copyright holders like Warner Bros. do not 'buy into' this, believing that such behavior is equivalent to unauthorized commercial reproduction and does not meet any of the statutory standards for 'fair use.' 此案的核心法律争议预计将围绕「合理使用」（Fair Use）原则展开。报道指出，多数 AI 公司会为自己辩称「使用公开数据进行模型训练属于‘变革性使用’，应受到法律保护。」但华纳兄弟等版权方并不「买账」，认为这种行为等同于未经许可的商业性复制，不符合「合理使用」的任何一项法定标准。

Coincidentally, news organizations, writers, and artist groups have previously filed similar lawsuits against companies like OpenAI and Stability AI. 无独有偶，此前已有新闻机构、作家和艺术家团体对 OpenAI、Stability AI 等公司提起了类似的法律诉讼。

Analysts believe that Warner Bros., as a giant with a world-class IP library, its actions will have a decisive impact on the legal boundaries and industry norms for future AI training data. 分析人士认为，华纳兄弟作为拥有全球顶级 IP 库的巨头，其行动将对未来 AI 训练数据的法律边界和行业规范产生决定性的影响。

item.title: 雷鸟宣布与 B&O 合作
item.description:
During IFA 2025 on September 5th, Beijing time, RayNeo, a leading global brand in AI+AR glasses, announced a global long-term technical cooperation with Bang&Olufsen, the century-old Danish high-end audio brand. 北京时间 9 月 5 日 IFA 2025 期间，全球 AI+AR 眼镜领先品牌雷鸟创新（RayNeo）宣布与拥有百年历史的丹麦殿堂级音响 Bang&Olufsen 达成全球长期技术合作。

In the future, Bang&Olufsen will provide professional audio tuning capabilities, 'Audio by Bang&Olufsen,' for RayNeo's new products, jointly pushing AI and AR glasses into a new stage in the field of 'audio-visual synergy.' 未来，Bang&Olufsen 将为雷鸟旗下新品提供专业音频调校能力「Audio by Bang&Olufsen」，共同推动 AI 与 AR 眼镜在「视听协同」领域迈入新阶段。

It's worth noting that the first product of their collaboration, RayNeo Air 4, will debut in China in October and launch globally in December. 值得一提的是， 双方合作的首款产品雷鸟 Air 4 将于 10 月在中国首发，12 月登陆全球。

item.title: 余承东：新问界 M7 卖爆了
item.description:
Yesterday, AITO Motors opened pre-orders for the new M7, with a starting pre-sale price of 288,000 yuan. 昨日，问界汽车开启了全新 M7 的预订，预售价为 28.8 万元起。

It's worth mentioning that after M7 pre-orders opened, Huawei Mall and HarmonyOS Smart Travel mini-program briefly crashed. Within 10 minutes of opening pre-orders, small orders exceeded 20,000 units, and within 1 hour, they surpassed 100,000 units. 值得一提的是，M7 预订开启后，华为商城和鸿蒙智行小程序一度崩溃，开启预订 10 分钟后小订突破 2 万台，1 小时突破 10 万台。

According to IT Home, Richard Yu, Huawei's Executive Director and CEO of Consumer BG, also stated on his WeChat Moments, 'To be precise, it broke 100,000 units in 43 minutes! The new M7 is selling like hotcakes! Far exceeding expectations. Beyond imagination!' 据 IT 之家消息，华为常务董事、终端 BG 董事长余承东还在朋友圈表示， 「准确点，43 分钟突破 10 万台！新 M7 卖爆了！远超预期。超乎想象！。」

It is reported that the new AITO M7 offers two power forms, extended-range and pure electric, and two seating layouts, five-seater and six-seater; specifically for the pre-sale prices: 据悉，新款问界 M7 有增程纯电两种动力形式，提供五座六座两种座位布局；具体预售价来看：

  • The extended-range five-seater version has a starting pre-sale price of 288,000 yuan, and the six-seater version starts at 308,000 yuan, both with standard four-wheel drive; 增程五座版预售价为 28.8 万元起，六座版预售价为 30.8 万元起，标配四驱；
  • The pure electric five-seater version has a starting pre-sale price of 328,000 yuan, and the six-seater version starts at 348,000 yuan. 纯电五座版预售价为 32.8 万元起，六座版为 34.8 万元起。

The new AITO M7 measures 5080 × 1999 × 1780mm, with a wheelbase of 3030mm; the new car's design has undergone significant changes, with its overall style moving closer to the AITO M8. 全新问界 M7 尺寸为 5080 ×1999×1780mm、轴距 3030mm；新车设计有了显著变化，整体风格向问界 M8 靠拢。

The new car comes standard with Huawei Qiankun ADS 4 intelligent assisted driving across all models, with the Pro+ version being the industry's first to feature in-cabin laser vision, enabling urban NCA functionality. 新车全系标配华为乾崑 ADS 4 智能辅助驾驶，其中 Pro+ 版本将行业首发舱内激光视觉，将实现城区 NCA 功能。

According to previously released information, the M7 extended-range version offers two battery options: 37 kWh and 53 kWh, with a comprehensive range of 1600km; the pure electric version comes standard with a 100 kWh battery, offering a maximum range of approximately 700km. 根据之前公布的信息，M7 增程版有 37 度和 53 度两种版本可选，综合续航 1600km；纯电版则标配 100 度电池，最高续航约 700km。

item.title: 💡 吴恩达：不懂计算机原理，就不可能只靠「Vibe Code」变优秀
item.guid: https://www.ifanr.com/1636961#💡-吴恩达：不懂计算机原理，就不可能只靠「Vibe-Code」变优秀
item.description:
Recently, Andrew Ng, an adjunct professor in the Computer Science Department at Stanford University, published a personal blog analyzing the current state of AI and programming and sharing some of his personal insights. 日前，斯坦福大学计算机科学系副教授吴恩达发布个人博客，对当前 AI 与编程的现状进行了分析，并分享了自己的一些个人看点。

Andrew Ng pointed out that on one hand, there is a huge and unmet demand in the market for developers who understand AI, with many large enterprises and startups eager to recruit such talent; but on the other hand, recently graduated computer science (CS) students are facing rising unemployment. He believes this is mainly because university curricula have not kept pace with the industry changes brought about by generative AI. 吴恩达指出，市场上一方面存在着对理解 AI 的开发者的巨大且未被满足的需求，许多大型企业和初创公司都渴望招聘这类人才；但另一方面，新近毕业的计算机科学（CS）专业学生却面临着失业率上升的困境。他认为，这主要是因为大学课程的调整未能跟上生成式 AI 所带来的行业变革。

When discussing what he considers an 'AI engineer,' Andrew Ng emphasized three key capabilities: 在谈到他所认为的「AI 工程师」时，吴恩达强调了三项关键能力：

  • Ability to quickly build software systems with AI assistance; 能够利用 AI 辅助来快速构建软件系统；
  • Proficiency in using AI modules like Prompting and RAG to build applications; 熟练运用提示工程（Prompting）、RAG 等 AI 模块来搭建应用；
  • Possession of a habit for rapid prototyping and iteration. 具备快速原型设计和迭代的习惯。

Regarding the market's claim that 'AI native' graduates are superior to experienced programmers, Andrew Ng expressed a more nuanced view. He admitted that an AI-proficient newcomer might indeed outperform a seasoned developer who clings to old ways of working. However, he emphasized that today's top developers are those veterans who combine deep software engineering experience with cutting-edge AI tools. 对于市场上「AI 原生代」毕业生优于资深程序员的说法，吴恩达表达了更细致的看法。他承认，一个精通 AI 的新人确实可能胜过一个固守旧工作方式的资深开发者。但他强调，当今最顶尖的开发者，是那些将深厚的软件工程经验与前沿 AI 工具相结合的资深人士。

He further explained that while AI has made much past knowledge (such as memorizing vast amounts of syntax) less important, the core foundations of computer science remain the cornerstone. Andrew Ng believes that combining approximately 70% of CS foundational knowledge with modern AI skills is what creates truly efficient developers. 他进一步解释，尽管 AI 让许多过去的知识（如记忆大量语法）变得不再重要，但计算机科学的核心基础依然是基石。吴恩达认为，大概 70% 的 CS 基础知识与现代 AI 技能相结合，才能造就真正高效的开发者。

In his view, without understanding how computers work, relying purely on 'feel' cannot build great systems. 在他看来， 不理解计算机工作原理，纯靠「感觉」是无法构建出伟大系统的。

Finally, Andrew Ng concluded that for individuals who can integrate a solid CS foundation with modern AI skills, job opportunities in the market are actually extremely abundant. 最后，吴恩达总结道，对于那些能够将坚实的 CS 基础与现代 AI 技能融会贯通的人才来说，就业市场上的机会实际上是极其丰富的。

item.title: 联想发布可旋转屏幕笔记本
item.guid: https://www.ifanr.com/1636961#联想发布可旋转屏幕笔记本
item.description:
At the recently held Lenovo Innovation World 2025, Lenovo unveiled its latest AI innovation product portfolio, including new form-factor AI concept devices, high-performance PCs, smart tablets, immersive gaming devices, and Motorola smartphones. 在日前举办的 2025 联想创新世界大会（Lenovo Innovation World 2025）上，联想推出了最新的 AI 创新产品组合，包括全新形态 AI 概念设备、高性能 PC、智能平板、沉浸式游戏设备和摩托罗拉智能手机。

The Lenovo ThinkBook VertiFlex concept machine is the industry's first laptop equipped with a 14-inch rotatable screen. With a thickness of 17.9 mm and a weight of 1.39 kg, it features a unique rotating display system that supports dual-mode switching between traditional horizontal and vertical orientations. 联想 ThinkBook VertiFlex 概念机是 业内首款配备 14 英寸可旋转屏幕的笔记本电脑。 17.9 毫米厚度和 1.39 公斤重量，配备独有的旋转显示系统，支持传统水平和垂直方向之间的双模式切换。

In vertical display mode, the machine is an ideal choice for scenarios such as split-screen multitasking, displaying code, and viewing documents. Furthermore, in vertical display mode, smartphones can seamlessly connect to the PC via Lenovo Smart Connect for file transfer and phone mirroring. 机器在垂直显示模式下是分屏多任务、显示代码和查看文档等场景更理想的选择。并且，在垂直显示模式下，智能手机可以通过联想超级互联（Smart Connect）无缝连接到 PC 上，用于传输文件和手机镜像。

Lenovo also introduced the Dynamic AI Dock this time. Reportedly, this product is the industry's first smart multi-directional laptop stand concept product. It innovatively integrates a camera, microphone, and speakers, offering automatic face tracking, voice control, and ergonomic health features. 本次联想还带来了 灵动 AI 底座。 据悉，该产品是业界首款智能多向笔记本电脑支架概念产品。它创新的集成了摄像头、麦克风和扬声器，提供自动面部跟踪、语音控制和人体工程学健康功能。

Lenovo also launched new AI tablets: the new Yoga Tab features a 3.2K PureSight Pro display, possesses hybrid AI capabilities, and supports the Lenovo Tab Pen Pro stylus; also released concurrently is the ultra-light Idea Tab Plus, which integrates AI tools such as Smart Notes, Circle to Search, and large model integration. 联想还推出了全新的 AI 平板电脑：新款 Yoga Tab 搭载 3.2K PureSight Pro 显示屏，具备混合 AI 能力，并支持联想 Tab Pen Pro 手写笔；同期发布的还有超轻薄的 Idea Tab Plus，同时集成了智能笔记（Smart Notes）、即圈即搜（Circle to Search）和大模型集成等 AI 工具。

item.title: Kimi 正式发布 K2 模型最新版「0905」
item.description:
On September 5th, Moonshot AI's Kimi officially announced the latest version of its K2 model, '0905'. 9 月 5 日，月之暗面 Kimi 正式公布了 K2 模型最新版本「0905」。

It is reported that K2-0905 further improves performance in real-world programming tasks: 据悉，K2-0905 进一步提升在真实编程任务中的表现：

  • Enhanced Agentic Coding capabilities: demonstrating better performance in both public benchmarks and real-world programming tasks; Agentic Coding 能力提升：在公开基准测试和真实的编程任务中均展现出更好的性能；

    • Front-end programming experience upgrade: improved the aesthetics and practicality of front-end code;

    Extended context length: upgraded to 256K, providing better support for complex long-term tasks;

    High-speed API provided: supports output speeds of up to 60-100 Token/s.

Specifically, in benchmark tests such as SWE-bench Multilingual, which focuses on real software engineering tasks, K2-0905 achieved performance comparable to or even surpassing Anthropic Claude Sonnet 4. 具体表现上， 在侧重考察真实软件工程任务的 SWE-bench Multilingual 等基准测试中，K2-0905 实现了 媲美甚至超越 Anthropic Claude Sonnet 4。

Currently, the K2 model in Kimi's app and web version has been fully upgraded to the latest 0905 version; the Kimi Open Platform has also launched the kimi-k2-0905-preview model API and has uploaded it to platforms such as HuggingFace and ModelScope. 目前，Kimi 应用和网页版中的 K2 模型已全量升级到 0905 最新版；Kimi 开放平台也已上架 kimi-k2-0905-preview 模型 API，并已上传 HuggingFace、ModelScope 等平台。

item.title: 阿里通义 Qwen3 Max 上架
item.description:
Early this morning, Alibaba Cloud's Tongyi once again launched a new model overnight — Qwen3-Max-Preview (Instruct) is now online. 今天凌晨，阿里通义又来连夜上架新模型了 —— Qwen3-Max-Preview（Instruct）上线。

According to official introduction, Qwen3-Max is Tongyi's largest model to date, with over 1 trillion parameters. In terms of performance, Qwen3-Max-Preview has demonstrated world-leading levels in multiple mainstream authoritative benchmark tests: 据官方介绍， Qwen3-Max 是通义迄今为止最大的模型，参数量超 1 万亿。 性能表现上，Qwen3-Max-Preview 在多项主流权威基准测试中展现出全球领先水平：

In evaluations for general knowledge (SuperGPQA), mathematical reasoning (AIME25), programming (LiveCodeBench v6), human preference alignment (Arena-Hard v2), and comprehensive capability assessment (LiveBench), Qwen3-Max-Preview surpassed Claude-Opus 4 (Non-Thinking), as well as Kimi-K2, DeepSeek-V3.1, and Qwen3-235B-A22B-Instruct-2507.

According to Tongyi's internal tests and early user evaluations, Qwen3-Max-Preview indeed demonstrated stronger intelligence, a broader knowledge base, and superior conversational abilities, with more robust performance in agent tasks and instruction following. 另据通义的内部测试和早期用户测评中，Qwen3-Max-Preview 的确表现出更强的智能水平，更广的知识面，更优秀的对话能力，在 Agent 任务与指令遵循等方面拥有更强劲的性能。

Currently, Qwen3-Max-Preview has been officially launched on the Alibaba Cloud Bailian platform and can be directly called via API. Concurrently, Qwen Chat has also launched the new model, supporting free use. 目前，Qwen3-Max-Preview 已正式上线阿里云百炼平台，可通过 API 直接调用。同时，Qwen Chat 也同步上线新模型，支持免费使用。

item.title: 戴森发布新一代家居科技
item.guid: https://www.ifanr.com/1636961#戴森发布新一代家居科技
item.description:
Recently, Dyson held its largest new product launch event to date in Berlin, Germany. At the "Dyson Unveiled" global launch event, a concentrated display of multiple new products, including vacuum cleaners, purifiers, and hair care devices, was showcased: 近日，戴森在德国柏林举办了迄今为止最大规模的新品亮相活动。在「戴森新科技 见分晓（Dyson Unveiled）」全球发布活动上，涵盖吸尘器、净化器、美发护发等多款全新力作集中亮相：

    PencilVac: Its 38mm slim body houses Dyson's fastest and smallest Hyperdymium 140K motor in vacuum history, and features a newly designed Fluffycones quad-cone omnidirectional cleaner head. Combined with bidirectional optical detection technology and a flexible interface design, it achieves 360° flexible cleaning; additionally, the PencilVac also introduces an air-compression dustbin for the first time.

    New Dyson V8 Cyclone Cordless Vacuum Cleaner: Building upon the V8's iconic cyclone and whole-machine sealed system, it achieves a 30% increase in no-loss suction power and 50% longer battery life.

    New Dyson V16 Piston Animal Cordless Vacuum Cleaner: Equipped with Dyson's powerful Hyperdymium 900W motor, it generates 315AW of strong suction power, and with dynamic cyclone technology, achieves an effective balance between suction and battery life.

    Dyson HushJet Purifier Compact HJ10 Air Purifier: Features Dyson's newly developed star-shaped nozzle, achieving 5 times airflow amplification; simultaneously, the star-shaped design effectively reduces airflow turbulence and lowers noise, operating at only 24 decibels in night mode; in terms of filtration performance, the HJ10 for the first time uses a dual-effect filter for particulate matter and formaldehyde, capable of capturing 99.97% of particles as small as 0.3 microns.

    In addition, several hair care products were also launched at the event: the new hair styling products can not only quickly dry hair but also create various styles such as straight and curly hair; the hair care product series can nourish hair, reduce frizz, and present hair shine.

item.title: 全新蔚来 ES8 将于 9 月 20 日上市

item.title: 宝马新款 iX3 亮相，概念走入现实
item.guid: https://www.ifanr.com/1636961#宝马新款-iX3-亮相，概念走入现实
item.description:
Recently, BMW officially unveiled its new iX3 model, which also serves as the first mass-produced vehicle under the "Neue Klasse" strategy. 日前，宝马正式公布了旗下全新 iX3 车型，同时新车也作为「Neue Klasse」战略的首款量产车型。

Compared to the previously released Vision Neue Klasse X concept car, the production version of the iX3 largely retains the original design philosophy , both in terms of proportions and styling. 和此前发布的 Vision Neue Klasse X 概念车相比对， 量产版的 iX3 在很大程度上保留了原来的设计理念 ，无论是比例还是造型。

On the front fascia, the new car's double-kidney grille, previously composed of chrome and black trim, has evolved into a closed "digital panel" integrating the headlights and sensors; the classic "angel eyes" daytime running lights are reinterpreted as two parallel, slightly angled LED light strips, forming a new visual symbol. 前脸上，新车将过去由镀铬件和黑色饰板构成的双肾格栅，演变为了一个封闭的、集成了前大灯组与传感器的「数字面板」；经典的「天使眼」日间行车灯被重新诠释为两道上下平行、略带角度的 LED 光带，构成了新的视觉符号。

In terms of interior, the new iX3 also boasts a high degree of concept fidelity. Whether it's the panoramic head-up display along the lower edge of the windshield, the modern "Hypersense steering wheel," or the parallelogram-shaped central control screen, all can be said to be almost identical to the concept car. 内饰方面，全新 iX3 的同样也有很高的概念还原度。无论是风挡下沿的全景平视信息屏，还是造型现代的「超感方向盘」，亦或是呈平行四边形的中控屏幕，都可以说几乎和概念车一模一样。

Regarding the platform, the iX3 is built on BMW's newly developed pure electric exclusive platform (NCAR – New Cluster Architecture), with its underlying architecture moving away from the transitional solution of shared oil-electric platforms. The core of the powertrain is the sixth-generation BMW eDrive electric drive technology. 平台方面，iX3 基于宝马全新研发的纯电动专属平台（NCAR – New Cluster Architecture）打造，其底层架构告别了油电共用的过渡方案。动力系统的核心，是第六代 BMW eDrive 电驱技术。

The battery is also a key focus of the iX3's generational update. It uses large cylindrical cells jointly developed with CATL and EVE Energy, replacing the square cells used for a long time previously. BMW states that the new iX3 has a WLTP range of 800km. 电池也是 iX3 这次换代的重点，它采用了与宁德时代、亿纬锂能联合开发的大圆柱电芯，取代了过去长期使用的方形电芯。宝马表示，全新 iX3 的 WLTP 工况续航里程达到了 800km。

In the field of artificial intelligence, it will integrate the AI large model capabilities of Alibaba and DeepSeek ; at the digital ecosystem level, through cooperation with Huawei , the iX3 will support interconnected services such as HUAWEI HiCar; in terms of intelligent driving assistance systems, BMW has chosen to jointly develop with Momenta to provide a set of advanced assisted driving solutions better adapted to China's complex traffic conditions. 在人工智能领域， 它将集成阿里巴巴和 DeepSeek 的 AI 大模型能力 ；在数字生态层面， 通过与华为的合作 ，iX3 将支持 HUAWEI HiCar 等互联服务；在智能驾驶辅助系统方面， 宝马则选择与 Momenta 共同开发 ，提供一套更适应中国复杂交通路况的高阶辅助驾驶解决方案。

🔗 Related reading: Concept car restored! The new BMW iX3 officially unveiled, and the new 3 Series also made an appearance. 🔗 相关阅读：还原概念车！全新宝马 iX3 正式亮相，新 3 系也露面了

item.title: 《空洞骑士：丝之歌》中文翻译遭集体吐槽
item.guid: https://www.ifanr.com/1636961#《空洞骑士：丝之歌》中文翻译遭集体吐槽
item.description:
Recently, the highly anticipated "Hollow Knight: Silksong" was officially released for sale, and due to too many purchasers and no pre-loading, it caused an hour-long outage on Steam and Nintendo eShop. 日前，备受期待的《空洞骑士：丝之歌》正式上架发售，甚至因为购买人数太多，又没有预载，引发了 Steam 和任天堂 eShop 长达一小时的宕机。

It's worth noting that the Chinese localization of "Silksong" seems to have received overwhelmingly negative reviews from domestic players. 值得一提的是，《丝之歌》的中文本地化，似乎受到国内玩家一边倒的恶评。

Many netizens criticized that the Chinese dialogue content overly pursued elegance, making the game text quite awkward and even completely incomprehensible, as if possessed by an "ancient scholar." Currently, the Steam China region's positive review rate for "Silksong" is only around 51%. 很多网友批评，中文台词内容太过刻意追求文雅，导致游戏文本相当别扭，甚至完全无法理解，仿佛「古风小生」附体。 目前《丝之歌》的 Steam 国区好评率仅有 51% 左右。

Matthew Griffin, Head of Game Marketing and Publishing, posted on X yesterday, stating that he has noticed issues with the quality of the simplified Chinese translation of the game and will soon make improvements to the Chinese localization. 而游戏市场营销、发行负责人 Matthew Griffin 昨日在 X 发文表示，已经注意到游戏的简体中文翻译质量问题，很快会对中文本地化做出改进。

Additionally, some Tieba netizens found that some translated texts in "Silksong" have issues with non-standard character usage, for example, simplified characters like "灰" (huī, ash) and "径" (jìng, path) were used as Japanese kanji, and the game's font appears less sharp and aesthetically pleasing compared to the original "Hollow Knight". 另外，还有部分贴吧网友发现，《丝之歌》的部分翻译文本存在用字不规范问题，例如「灰」「径」等简体字用成了和制汉字，且游戏的字体相比初代《空洞骑士》显得不够锐利美观。

item.title: lululemon 二季度全球净营收达 25 亿美元
item.guid: https://www.ifanr.com/1636961#lululemon-二季度全球净营收达-25-亿美元
item.description:
Yesterday, lululemon released its Q2 FY2025 earnings report: 昨日，lululemon 发布了 2025 财年第二季度财报：

In the second quarter, the company's global net revenue increased by 7% year-over-year to $2.5 billion, with international business net revenue growing by 22%.

lululemon CEO Calvin McDonald stated that in the second quarter, the company continued to maintain strong growth momentum in international markets, but its performance in the US market and some product categories did not meet expectations. lululemon CEO Calvin McDonald 表示,第二季度，公司在国际市场继续保持着稳健的增长势头，但在美国市场的业绩和部分产品表现未达预期。

In response, Calvin stated that lululemon has thoroughly evaluated and will continue to take necessary measures. "We remain confident in future development and firmly believe that the company's existing strategic layout will support long-term steady growth." 对此，Calvin 表示，lululemon 已深入评估，并将继续采取必要措施。「我们仍对未来的发展充满信心，并坚信公司现有的战略布局将助力长期稳健增长。」

Specifically for the Chinese mainland market, Calvin mentioned in the earnings call that as lululemon's second largest global market, net revenue for its Chinese mainland business increased by 25% year-over-year in the second quarter, and by 24% in constant dollars. 具体至中国大陆市场，Calvin 在财报电话会议中提到，作为 lululemon 全球第二大市场，第二季度中国大陆业务净营收同比增长 25%，按固定美元计算增长 24%。

It is reported that lululemon expects net revenue for the third quarter of fiscal year 2025 to be between $2.47 billion and $2.5 billion, an increase of approximately 3%-4%. 据悉，lululemon 预计 2025 财年第三季度净营收将在 24.7 亿美元至 25 亿美元之间，增长约 3%-4%。

For fiscal year 2025, lululemon expects net revenue to be between $10.85 billion and $11 billion , an increase of approximately 2%-4%; excluding the 53rd week of 2024, the increase would be approximately 4%-6%. 对于 2025 财年， lululemon 预计净营收将在 108.5-110 亿美元之间 ，增长约 2%-4%；若不计入 2024 年第 53 周，则增长约为 4%-6%。

item.title: 博物馆回应网红狮标本面容怪异
item.guid: https://www.ifanr.com/1636961#博物馆回应网红狮标本面容怪异
item.description:
According to Jiupai News, netizens recently discovered that the African lion specimen at the Shanghai Natural History Museum has protruding eyes and a strange face, appearing "not very smart," and has even been made into emoticons. 据九派新闻消息，近期有网友发现，上海自然博物馆非洲狮标本双眼突出、面容怪异，出现「不太聪明」的样子，甚至还被制成表情包。

In response, staff at the Shanghai Natural History Museum stated in a report that this lion specimen is the museum's "internet-famous lion," attracting many visitors who come specifically to check it out, and related merchandise is also selling very well. 对此，上海自然博物馆工作人员通过报道回应称，这只狮子标本是馆内的「网红狮」，不少游客专门慕名而来打卡，相关周边也卖得十分火爆。

It is understood that this internet-famous lion specimen's prototype was an adult male lion from Hangzhou Zoo. After its death in 1977, it was sent to the Shanghai Natural History Museum to be made into a specimen. Its current face displays a unique and striking bizarre expression, with the core reason lying in the historical context of its specimen creation: 据了解，这只风靡网络的狮子标本，其原型是杭州动物园的一只成年雄狮，该狮子于 1977 年死亡后，被送至上海自然博物馆制成标本。如今面容呈现出独特且引人注目的怪异神情，核心原因在于标本制作的时代背景：

At that time, due to technological limitations, the materials used to fill the specimen were straw, accompanied by an iron frame as a supporting structure. As time passed, coupled with changes in the museum's environmental factors, these original fillers gradually became unable to withstand the erosion of time, leading to aging, deformation, and other issues, ultimately causing significant deformation in the specimen's facial structure. 当时受限于技术局限， 标本体内填充的材料为稻草，同时搭配铁架作为支撑结构。 随着时间推移，再加上博物馆内环境因素的变化，这些原始填充物逐渐难以抵御岁月侵蚀，出现老化、变形等情况，最终导致标本面部结构发生明显形变。

item.title: 电影《只此青绿》本月重映
item.description:
According to Sina Movies, the film 'Poetic Dance: The Journey of a Legendary Landscape Painting' (《只此青绿》) announced its re-release on September 15th and unveiled a new poster. 据新浪电影消息，电影《只此青绿》宣布定档 9 月 15 日重映，并发布全新海报。

Through ten chapters titled 'Inquiring about Seals, First Encounter, Singing Silk, Listening to Rain, Seeking Stone, Practicing Brush, Azure Green, Quenching Ink, Deep Contemplation, Entering the Painting,' the film tells Chinese stories, inherits traditional culture, and depicts the genius young artist Ximeng, who created a masterpiece at eighteen, and the scroll guardian of today, looking across a thousand years of time and space, jointly painting a scroll of Chinese civilization. 影片通过「问篆、初见、唱丝、听雨、寻石、习笔、青绿、淬墨、苦思、入画」十个篇章，讲中国故事传承传统文化，十八岁绘就旷世之作的天才少年希孟，与今时今日守护文物的展卷人，置身于千年时空中遥遥相望，共绘中华文明画卷。

The film is adapted from the dance poetry drama of the same name, directed by dance world 'twin stars' Zhou Liya and Han Zhen, starring Zhang Han, Meng Qingyang, and Xie Suhao, with limited theatrical previews starting on September 13-14. 影片由同名舞蹈诗剧改编，舞坛「双子星」周莉亚、韩真导演，张翰、孟庆旸、谢素豪领衔主演，9 月 13-14 日限量影院开启点映。

item.title: One Fun Thing｜麦当劳婚礼真的有！
item.description:
According to Jiupai News, a unique experience of a couple holding their wedding at McDonald's in Guangzhou recently attracted attention. 据九派新闻报道，近日，广州一对新人在麦当劳举办婚礼的独特经历引起关注。

According to the bride Regina, the McDonald's where the wedding was held was where she and her husband had their first date. The per capita cost was about 80 yuan, and the event lasted for an hour and a half. 据新娘雷金娜透露，举办婚礼的麦当劳是她和丈夫第一次约会的地方， 人均花费大概 80 元，活动持续了一个半小时。

A staff member from the McDonald's branch that hosted the wedding stated that the branch did indeed hold a wedding at the end of August and provided group meal pricing standards, saying, 'We can play one or two small games with customers, and the minimum spend is 500 yuan.' 举办这次婚礼的麦当劳门店工作人员表示，该门店 8 月底确实举办了一次婚礼，并提供了团餐的价格标准，「可以和顾客玩一到两个小游戏，最低消费为 500 元。」

Regina explained that in August, she and her husband went to the civil affairs bureau to get their marriage certificate and invited nearly 20 friends for a meal. 'According to friends' experience, after getting the certificate, it might be past 1 PM, and many restaurants would be closed. I happened to see some couples abroad holding weddings at McDonald's on social media, so I told my partner, and he was very supportive.' 雷金娜介绍，8 月她和丈夫去民政局领证，并邀请近 20 名朋友前来聚餐，「按照朋友的经验，领完证可能要中午 1 点多，很多餐厅会停止营业，我刚好在社交媒体上看到国外一些新人在麦当劳办婚礼，就和另一半说了，他非常赞成。」

The store provided some decorations, the event lasted an hour and a half, and during the meal, staff organized games and Q&A sessions. Regarding the cost, Regina said: 'The per capita cost was about 80 yuan. McDonald's parties cannot use coupons or order 1+1 combos. The store provides specific multi-person meal options for parties, and you can also order snacks and ice cream à la carte.' 门店提供了部分装饰物，活动时间为一个半小时，用餐时工作人员组织了游戏和问答环节。谈及花费，雷金娜说：「人均大概 80 元，麦当劳派对不能用优惠券、点 1+1 套餐，门店会给派对指定多人套餐选择，还能单点小吃和雪糕。」

For young people who want to hold a special wedding, Regina sincerely suggests that getting married and obtaining a marriage certificate is a happy and joyful event. Plan the wedding you want according to your own wishes. The most important thing is to have a partner willing to do this with you, and just be happy. 对于想举办特别婚礼的年轻人， 雷金娜真诚建议，结婚领证是开心幸福的事，想办什么样的婚礼就按自己的意思来，最重要的是有愿意陪你做这件事的另一半，开心就好。

item.title: 周末看什么｜《里斯本丸沉没》
item.description:
'The Sinking of the Lisbon Maru' has a Douban rating of 9.3, making it 'Douban's highest-rated documentary of 2024.' 《里斯本丸沉没》豆瓣评分 9.3 分，为「豆瓣 2024 评分最高纪录片」。

The documentary tells the story of World War II in 1941, when British soldiers, unable to resist the Japanese attack, surrendered and became prisoners of war. Over 1,800 of them were put on the merchant ship 'Lisbon Maru' by the Japanese. On its way from Hong Kong, China, to Japan, it was hit by an American torpedo. When the Japanese evacuated, they trapped the British POWs in the hold. Chinese fishermen from Zhoushan discovered and rescued the survivors from the water. 该纪录片讲述了 1941 年二战时期，英国士兵不敌日军的进攻而投降成为了战俘，1800 多人被日军送上「里斯本丸」号商船，在从中国香港开往日本的途中被美军的鱼雷击中，日军撤离时把英国战俘困在船舱里，被中国舟山渔民发现并救起了水中的幸存者。

Filmmaker Fang Li and his production team conducted detailed historical investigations, doing their utmost to interview key individuals and their descendants from Britain, America, Japan, and China, attempting to get as close as possible to the truth behind the 'death ship' wreck from World War II, located 30 meters underwater near Dongji Island, Zhoushan, China. 电影人方励和摄制组通过详尽的历史调查，极尽所能地寻访英、美、日、中核心当事人及后代，试图无限接近中国舟山东极岛附近海底 30 米处的二战「死亡之船」的沉船真相。

Recently, "The Sinking of the Lisbon Maru" also announced that, to commemorate the 80th anniversary of the victory of the Anti-Japanese War and the victory of World Anti-Fascist War, after a year, a special encore screening will be held on September 6, 2025 (today). 近期， 《里斯本丸沉没》还宣布，为纪念抗日战争胜利暨世界反法西斯战争胜利 80 周年，时隔一年，将于 2025 年 9 月 6 日（今日）开启特别加映。

item.title: 买书不读指南｜《胖乎乎圆嘟嘟》
item.guid: https://www.ifanr.com/1636961#买书不读指南｜《胖乎乎圆嘟嘟》
item.description:
"Chubby and Round" has a Douban rating of 8.2. 《胖乎乎圆嘟嘟》豆瓣评分 8.2 分。

This book is a girl's coming-of-age memoir about food, about how to reconcile with one's body, and also about love and anxiety. The book features not only common items like Pizza Hut, DQ ice cream, fried chicken and fries, but also South Asian chaat salad, fried vegetables, and grilled meat. In short, it is a warm and "appetizing" healing read. 该书为一部女孩成长回忆录，关于美食，关于如何与自己的身体和解，也关于爱和不安。书中不仅有常见的必胜客、DQ 冰淇淋、炸鸡薯条，更有南亚的恰特沙拉、炸时蔬和烤肉。总之，这是一本温暖而又充满「食欲」的治愈读物。

"Chubby and Round" cleverly avoids the clichés about weight loss and self-acceptance, with a humorous touch that makes people laugh, cry, and feel hungry. It is a love letter to food and a brave and honest self-portrait of women. 《胖乎乎圆嘟嘟》巧妙避开了有关减肥与自我接纳的种种陈词滥调，笔触幽默 ，让人笑、让人哭、也让人饥肠辘辘，是一封写给美食的情书，也是女性勇敢诚实的自我写照。

The author, Rabia Chaudry, is a lawyer, podcast host, and producer of the HBO documentary "The Case Against Adnan Syed." In the book, she also mentions some behind-the-scenes content from "The Case Against Adnan Syed." 作者拉比亚·乔德里（Rabia Chaudry）为律师、播客主持人和 HBO 纪录片《阿德南·赛义德案》制片人，书中她还提到了一部分《阿德南·赛义德案》的幕后内容。

item.title: 游戏推荐｜《拣爱》
item.description:
"LoveChoice" has a "Very Positive" rating on Steam, released in November 2021, priced at 10 yuan. 《拣爱》Steam 评分为「特别好评」，发行于 2021 年 11 月，售价 10 元。

The game unfolds with warm, quiet, and relatable love stories. It consists of three independent stories, which are short but seem to offer some solutions for real-life couples' interactions. 游戏以温暖、安静而贴近生活的爱情故事进行展开。整体由三个独立故事构成，故事内容短暂，却似乎也能为现实中的情侣相处找到一点解决办法。

The development team mentioned in the introduction, "When designing, we paid great attention to making every scene and every choice reasonable and meaningful. We strive to allow players to make meaningful choices in the game that truly affect the ending." 制作团队在介绍中提到，「我们在设计的时候十分在意让每一个场景，每一个选择都合理而有其自己的意义。力求让玩家能够在该游戏中做出有意义，且真正能影响结局的选择。」

Player "Ricardo Lu" commented: "It's indeed a very simple little game, but it really touched my heart." 玩家「Ricardo Lu」在评价中提到：「确实是很简单的小游戏，但也确实玩到心坎里去了。」
